section.heading: Transfers; abolishment.
section.text: All personnel, property, records, functions, and unexpended balances of funds from the following agencies, offices, or units are transferred to the Customer Service Operations Unit, established pursuant to § 1-327.32:

para.text: The Citywide Call Center established in § 1-327.01 [repealed];
The Mayor’s Correspondence Unit, established in Mayor’s Order 73-172, issued November 5, 1973; and
The Tester Program in the Executive Office of the Mayor.
